title: Step 63

challengeFiles.name: index
challengeFiles.contents: CSS Color Markers
challengeFiles.seed: CSS Color Markers

challengeFiles.name: styles

tests.text: Your .green CSS rule should have a background property set to linear-gradient(180deg, #55680D, #71F53E, #116C31).

description:
That's looking better, but the bottom edge of the green marker needs to be darker to add a little more dimension.

In the same linear-gradient function, add a hex color code with the values 11 for red, 6C for green, and 31 for blue as the third color argument.
